name: Escape from Zaphod
overview: A 3D adventure game created by Richard Bayliss & Joshua Green and published by TND in 2012. It was created with the 3D construction kit. The first ever freescape game from the author, written using the 3D Construction Kit by Incentive/Domark. In this game you are trapped on an alien planet called "Zaphod". You got captured by the aliens and thrown into a prison cell. One of the guards opened the door, but you tricked them. Now it is time to put your escape plan forward. But dare you escape from Zaphod. The music is also written by the creator.
